title: 'Inconsistent size and quality of stitching'
body: 'Lyriq is a very very inconsistent brand. Though the shirt fabric is good the sizes vary too much from shirt to shirt and the stitching quality is quite poor. Its almost a gamble to see if the size fits you well. Sometimes X-large fits perfectly while sometimes its too big and you have to go for Large. Not a dependable brand.'

title: 'Excellent Fabric'
body: 'I had ordered this shirts for me. I ordered M size instead of L size. The quality of the fabric is great. I would strictly recommend this product for daily uses and as the shirts comes in half sleeves so it is good for Summer season.'
